front.title: Definition of Time-to-Live TLV for LSP-Ping Mechanisms

abstract.t: LSP-Ping is a widely deployed Operation, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) mechanism in MPLS networks. However, in the present form, this mechanism is inadequate to verify connectivity of a segment of a Multi-Segment PseudoWire (MS-PW) from any node on the path of the MS-PW. This document defines a TLV to address this shortcoming.
